pull.title: VerifyDB: don't check blocks that have been pruned

events.body: utACK b88515167cc2a5da7dc11f66c58404cc06c92838 but this could also log when it runs out of data (might avoid a future bug where it hits that branch immediately and ends up checking nothing).

events.message: VerifyDB: don't check blocks that have been pruned

events.body: Added logging for when it runs out of data, as @gmaxwell suggested.
